author: Dorothy Rabinowitz
title: ‘McMafia’ Review: Crime Catches Up
text: At the beginning of the unfortunately titled “McMafia,” a saga about global crime kingpins, one of the most important and dangerous of the players is set up for a devastating hit—an action carried out with such silken aplomb it’s clear we’re about to enter high-level thriller territory. As in fact we do in this eight-episode series brimming with wildly suspenseful chases, stalkings in dark places, and assassins posing as charming new friends prepared to carry out a hit as soon as the text message ordering it arrives. There could, on the other hand, be a last-minute cancellation just before the trigger is pulled—we get... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
